trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> object that renders a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> object represents a sequence of glyphs from a single face of a single font at a single size, and with a single rendering style.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> contains font details such as glyph indices and individual glyph positions.

In addition, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> contains the original Unicode code points the run was generated from, character to glyph buffer offset mapping information, and per-character and per-glyph flags.
Each glyph in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>.
The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters.

![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters **Freezable Features:** A GlyphRunDrawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
**Caution:** GlyphRunDrawing objects do not support partial trust execution.
An application must have full trust permissions to use GlyphRunDrawing objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref> class by specifying the foreground brush and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
The foreground brush to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> to use in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets the foreground brush of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that paints the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.ForegroundBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> that describes the text to draw.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> that describes the text to draw.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.GlyphRun*> dependency property.
To be added.
